dc.title: United States Department of Justice National Sex Offender Public Website
dc.description: This web site is provided by the U.S. Department of Justice to facilitate a free nationwide search for sex offenders registered by states, territories, Indian tribes, and the District of Columbia. NSOPW is the only sex offender search site with direct access to live registered sex offender information from the individual registration jurisdictions.
